headline.print_headline: Tigers-White Sox Game Postponed by Rain
headline.main: Tigers-White Sox Game Postponed by Rain

docs.snippet: The Detroit Tigers will have to wait at least another day to try to snap out of their recent funk....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Detroit Tigers will have to wait at least another day to try to snap out of their recent funk.

headline.print_headline: World Bank Cuts Growth Outlook as Ukraine Crisis Weighs
headline.main: World Bank Cuts Growth Outlook as Ukraine Crisis Weighs

docs.snippet: The World Bank on Tuesday trimmed its global growth forecast, saying a confluence of events, from the Ukraine crisis to unusually cold weather in the United States, dampened economic expansion in the first half of the year....
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Bank on Tuesday trimmed its global growth forecast, saying a confluence of events, from the Ukraine crisis to unusually cold weather in the United States, dampened economic expansion in the first half of the year.

headline.print_headline: Houston Texan Lineman Quessenberry Diagnosed With Lymphoma
headline.main: Houston Texan Lineman Quessenberry Diagnosed With Lymphoma

docs.snippet: Houston Texans offensive lineman David Quessenberry, 23, was placed on the NFL's Non-Football Illness List on Tuesday after being diagnosed with lymphoma, a type of blood cancer, the team said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Houston Texans offensive lineman David Quessenberry, 23, was placed on the NFL's Non-Football Illness List on Tuesday after being diagnosed with lymphoma, a type of blood cancer, the team said.

headline.print_headline: New York Weighs Kids' Gay Conversion Therapy Ban
headline.main: New York Weighs Kids' Gay Conversion Therapy Ban

docs.snippet: A proposed ban against New York health professionals trying to change a child's sexual orientation through therapy comes too late for Matthew Shurka, a 26-year-old Long Island man who says he remains emotionally scarred from five years of attempts...
docs.lead_paragraph: A proposed ban against New York health professionals trying to change a child's sexual orientation through therapy comes too late for Matthew Shurka, a 26-year-old Long Island man who says he remains emotionally scarred from five years of attempts to "cure" his homosexuality.

headline.print_headline: After Ukraine, U.S. Trains More Special Forces in Eastern Europe
headline.main: After Ukraine, U.S. Trains More Special Forces in Eastern Europe

docs.snippet: As NATO refocuses on its eastern borders after Russia's annexation of Crimea, the United States is quietly deploying more troops to train special forces in former Soviet bloc states anxious about Moscow's intentions....
docs.lead_paragraph: As NATO refocuses on its eastern borders after Russia's annexation of Crimea, the United States is quietly deploying more troops to train special forces in former Soviet bloc states anxious about Moscow's intentions.

headline.print_headline: Not Everyone on Board With Florida Fast-Rail Project
headline.main: Not Everyone on Board With Florida Fast-Rail Project

headline.main: Detroit Denies Last-Minute Reprieve for Goats

docs.snippet: A hedge fund manager will sell baby goats to butchers sooner than expected, now that Detroit officials have failed to grant any reprieve to let them to graze in the city....
docs.abstract: A hedge fund manager will sell baby goats to butchers sooner than expected, now that Detroit officials have failed to grant any reprieve to let them to graze in the city.

headline.print_headline: Arrest Made in Shooting of Pregnant Teenager
headline.main: Arrest Made in Shooting of Pregnant Teenager

docs.snippet: Police have charged a 15-year-old boy with shooting a pregnant Pennsylvania teenager last month, killing her fetus....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police have charged a 15-year-old boy with shooting a pregnant Pennsylvania teenager last month, killing her fetus.
